original_text: (All the people, even the tax collectors, when they heard Jesus’ words, acknowledged that God’s way was right, because they had been baptized by John.
korean_text: 모든 백성과 세리들은 이미 요한의 세례를 받은지라 이 말씀을 듣고 하나님을 의롭다 하되

sentences.original_text: acknowledged that God's way was right
because they had been baptized by John
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 요한에게 세례를 받았기 때문이다
